00028 #include "OxygenBasedCellKiller.hpp"
00029 #include "ApoptoticCellProperty.hpp"
00030 
00031 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00032 OxygenBasedCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::OxygenBasedCellKiller(AbstractCellPopulation<SPACE_DIM>* pCellPopulation)
00033     : AbstractCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>(pCellPopulation)
00034 {
00035 }
00036 
00037 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00038 void OxygenBasedCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::TestAndLabelSingleCellForApoptosis(CellPtr pCell)
00039 {
00040     if (pCell->HasCellProperty<ApoptoticCellProperty>() && !(pCell->HasApoptosisBegun()))
00041     {
00042         pCell->StartApoptosis();
00043     }
00044 }
00045 
00046 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00047 void OxygenBasedCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::TestAndLabelCellsForApoptosisOrDeath()
00048 {
00049     for (typename AbstractCellPopulation<SPACE_DIM>::Iterator cell_iter = this->mpCellPopulation->Begin();
00050         cell_iter != this->mpCellPopulation->End();
00051         ++cell_iter)
00052     {
00053         TestAndLabelSingleCellForApoptosis(*cell_iter);
00054     }
00055 }
00056 
00057 template<unsigned DIM>
00058 void OxygenBasedCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00059 {
00060     // No parameters to output
00061 
00062     // Call method on direct parent class
00063     AbstractCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerParameters(rParamsFile);
00064 }
00065 
00067 // Explicit instantiation
00069 
00070 template class OxygenBasedCellKiller<1>;
00071 template class OxygenBasedCellKiller<2>;
00072 template class OxygenBasedCellKiller<3>;
00073
